ygData.subject: Re: Which spell to train conjure skill for wiz?
ygData.msgSnippet: My conjuration also sucks, I don t think there are any conjure spells earlier so i think must use halo of light to train. Btw, conjuration not very important
ygData.messageBody:
My conjuration also sucks, I don't think there are any conjure spells
earlier so i think must use halo of light to train. Btw, conjuration not
very important for wizs so no need to worry.
-----Original Message-----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 12:14 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Which spell to train conjure skill for wiz?


>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Leshrec, which spell u use to train ya conjure? So far I'm using eye of
>xxx and halo of light to train conjure. H/w, both consume 30 & 40 mana
>respectively - not very mana efficient. Is there a conjure spells from lvl
>1,4,8,12 wiz scrolls which consume only 5-20 mana? Thx.
